name: Space Blaster (SockDra)
description:
It is the year 30XX, and enemy eyes have invaded your sector of space.

Only you, a lone fighter, can stop them.

If not stopped, the eyes will spread.....

Destroying EARTH

Modifications Made:

  • UI Overhaul
    • New UI Box
    • Buttons Retextured/Recolored
    • Instruction Menu
  • New Enemies Variation
    • Some are now stronger
  • 3 Complete Levels
  • Logo for the title screen
  • Victory Screen
    • Victory Text
  • New Cursor

Game by Mariah Allum

Assets Pack Provided by Professor Brian Winn

Additional Song Computer Love by MarkDeeHD
